SEARCH
Package fr.simplon.oxosondages_client.controller

Class SondageController

java.lang.Object
fr.simplon.oxosondages_client.controller.SondageController
@Controller public class SondageController extends Object
The SondageController class serves as a controller for managing surveys. It handles GET and POST requests for displaying, adding, updating, and deleting surveys.

    • addSurvey

      @PostMapping("/sondages/form/add") public String addSurvey(@ModelAttribute("sondage") Sondage sondage)
      Adds a new survey to the database.
      Parameters:
      sondage - the Sondage object to be added
      Returns:
      a redirect to the home page

    • updateStudent

      @PostMapping("/sondages/update/{id}") public String updateStudent(@ModelAttribute("sondage") Sondage sondage, @PathVariable Long id)
      This method updates a survey using a PUT HTTP request to the server
      Parameters:
      sondage - The updated survey data
      id - The ID of the survey to update
      Returns:
      A String representing the redirect URL for the updated survey

    • delSurvey

      @GetMapping("sondages/delete/{id}") public String delSurvey(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable Long id)
      This method deletes a survey using a DELETE HTTP request to the server
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object used to store data for the view
      id - The ID of the survey to delete
      Returns:
      A String representing the redirect URL after the survey has been deleted
